## Launch Endpoint

Your backend calls this endpoint to receive a **single-use, short-lived** URL for the hosted Import/Validator page.

### Endpoint
```json
POST https://locimapper.com:8443/accounts/integrations/launch
```

### Request (JSON)
```json
{
  "client_id": "YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
  "client_secret": "YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET",
  "integration_id": "YOUR_INTEGRATION_ID"
}
```

### Successful Response (200)
```json
{
  "frontend_url": "https://locimapper.com/import-standalone#<short-lived-token>"
}
```

**Notes**
- Token appears in the **URL fragment** (after `#`), **single-use** and **short-lived**.
- Typical error: **422** (validation error) with details.

### Sample cURL
```bash
curl -X POST https://locimapper.com:8443/accounts/integrations/launch   
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"   
     -d '{
          "client_id":"YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
          "client_secret":"YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET",
          "integration_id":"YOUR_INTEGRATION_ID"
        }'
```
